attributes.action: stop wasting taxpayers money on funding of OFCOM.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ofcom is not allowed to investigate complaints from individuals.  Taxpayers are the individuals who are funding the existence of Ofcom and are, while they are paying for it, excluded from the benefits of using Ofcom to investigate and mediate on any problems them might have.  This just not make sense and must be stopped.  Let the people who can use Ofcom pay for it, we taxpayers shouldn't be doing it.

rejection.details: Ofcom does, if appropriate, investigate complaints from individuals. Information on how to complain can be found here: http://www.ofcom.org.uk/complain/ However, it does not regulate disputes between members of the public and telecoms providers.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
